TEXT.English: Your civ has died.[NEWLINE]Would you like to lead another civ?[NEWLINE]
TEXT.French: Votre civilisation est morte.[NEWLINE]Voulez-vous diriger une autre civilisation ?[NEWLINE]
TEXT.German: Während der Automatisierung wurde Ihre Zivilisation zerstört.[NEWLINE]Welches Volk wollt Ihr nun anführen?[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Italian: Your civ has died.[NEWLINE]Would you like to lead another civ?[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Spanish: Your civ has died.[NEWLINE]Would you like to lead another civ?[NEWLINE]

TEXT.French: Prendre le contrôle de la civilisation ...

TEXT.English: How many turns would you like the AI to control?
TEXT.French: Combien de tours souhaitez-vous que l'ordinateur joue en mode Jeu Automatique ?
TEXT.German: Wie viele Runden wollt Ihr Euch durch die KI vertreten lassen?
TEXT.Italian: How many turns would you like the AI to control?
TEXT.Spanish: How many turns would you like the AI to control?

TEXT.English: Automate unit moves only (not fully tested)
TEXT.French: Déplacement des unités seulement (Pas encore testé à fond)
TEXT.German: Nur Einheitenzüge automatisieren (noch nicht vollständig getestet)
TEXT.Italian: Automate unit moves only (not fully tested)
TEXT.Spanish: Automate unit moves only (not fully tested)

TEXT.French: Mode Debug (Révellera la carte du monde !!!)
Il y a un nouveau leader !!!

TEXT.English: Old age has finally caught up with you and you decide to abdicated rule.
TEXT.French: La vieillesse a fini par vous rattrapper et vous avez décidez d'abandonner le pouvoir.
TEXT.German: Ihr entscheidet Euch, abzudanken, da Euer Alter Euch schwer zu schaffen macht.
TEXT.Italian: Old age has finally caught up with you and you decide to abdicated rule.
TEXT.Spanish: Old age has finally caught up with you and you decide to abdicated rule.

TEXT.English: Terrible news:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Coniving rivals have overthrown you in a coup![NEWLINE]A little to much "Let them eat cake" perhaps?
TEXT.French: Terrible nouvelle :[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Vos amis politiques se sont révélés être vos rivaux et vous ont destitué ![NEWLINE]Peut-être leur avez-vous un peu trop fait confiance ?
TEXT.German: Erschreckende Neuigkeiten:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ein Usurpator hat Euch entmachtet![NEWLINE]Vielleicht habt Ihr ein wenig zu oft die Zügel schleifen lassen?
TEXT.Italian: Terrible news:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Coniving rivals have overthrown you in a coup![NEWLINE]A little to much "Let them eat cake" perhaps?
TEXT.Spanish: Terrible news:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Coniving rivals have overthrown you in a coup![NEWLINE]A little to much "Let them eat cake" perhaps?

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]However, there is good news![NEWLINE]Mystical advisors report that you will be reincarnated and return to power in %d turns.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In the meantime, you can only hope your successor proves worthy.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Toutefois, il y a une bonne nouvelle ![NEWLINE]Les astrologues prédisent votre réincarnation et votre retour au pouvoir dans %d tours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]En attendant, vous n'avez plus qu'à espérer que votre successeur agira correctement.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Aber es gibt auch eine gute Neuigkeit![NEWLINE]Sterndeuter sagen Euch voraus, dass Ihr in %d Runden die Macht zurückerlangt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In der Zwischenzeit könnt Ihr nur hoffen, dass der neue Herrscher sich als würdig erweist.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]However, there is good news![NEWLINE]Mystical advisors report that you will be reincarnated and return to power in %d turns.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In the meantime, you can only hope your successor proves worthy.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]However, there is good news![NEWLINE]Mystical advisors report that you will be reincarnated and return to power in %d turns.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In the meantime, you can only hope your successor proves worthy.
